data.text:
Hotel le Commerce

Bellegarde-du-Loiret

This hotel is located in Bellegarde, famous for its cultivation of rose bushes. It offers free, closed parking, a shady terrace and a restaurant specialising in meat, fish and regional dishes using saffron... view morefrom

€ 52Le Forestia

Pannes

Le Forestia is located in Montargis and offers modern 2-star accommodation. It is perfect for a stopover or short stay in the area. Guests can chose from comfortable single, twin and double rooms. Each room offers cable TV (TNT)... view morefrom

€ 50Best Western Les Terrasses de Montargis

Pannes

Best Western Les Terrasses de Montargis is located in Pannes, just 6 km from Montargis city centre. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and air-conditioned guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access... view morefrom

€ 58Chateau De Chicamour

Sury-aux-Bois

The Chateau de Chicamour is located in Sury-aux-Bois, close to the forest of Orléans. It offers spacious guest rooms, each with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi... view moreLa Bassinière

Noyers

This bed and breakfast is set in the countryside of Noyers in the Loiret region. It offers guest rooms with a view of the garden. Each guest room features a private bathroom with a shower. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the cottage... view morefrom
